# Instructor Information 

Greetings! My name is Michael Flynn. My research focuses on the political economy of US foreign policy, the influence of domestic politics on foreign policy, and the causes and consequences of US military deployments overseas. 

My research interests cover a number of areas, including US Foreign Policy, the  Political Economy of Security, Military Deployments, Statistical Research Methods, Bayesian Modeling, and Multilevel Modeling.


## Education

MA in Political Science | Binghamton University | 2009

BA in Politics | BA in History | SUNY Potsdam | 2006
